General.Name: Gresham House Energy Storage Fund PLC
General.Description: The company seeks to provide investors with an attractive and sustainable dividend over the long term by investing in a diversified portfolio of utility scale operational energy storage systems, which utilise batteries and may also utilise generators, located in Great Britain. In addition, the company seeks to provide investors with the prospect of capital growth through the re-investment of net cash generated in excess of the target dividend in accordance with the investment policy of the company and the requirements of the IT Regulations.
